main.description:
This is my official portfolio website to showcase all details
and experience in web development.

modal_one.description_one: This is a simple and interactive implementation of the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project allows two players to take turns marking spaces on a 3x3 grid until one achieves a winning combination or the game ends in a draw.
modal_one.description_two:
• Key features include:
  • A clean and responsive user interface
  • Visual feedback for player actions
  • Logic to detect wins, losses, and draws
modal_one.description_three: This project demonstrates core frontend development skills, including DOM manipulation, event handling, and basic game logic.

modal_two.description_one: This is an online food ordering platform built with React, using Firebase as the backend database. It enables users to browse a menu, manage a shopping cart, and submit orders.
modal_two.description_two: This project showcases skills in React component-based development, state management (useState, useReducer), and Firebase integration, making it a great example of a basic e-commerce application.

modal_three.description_one: This is a full-stack web application built for professional photographers. It features a public portfolio site, a private client area, and an admin dashboard for managing clients, orders, and communication.
modal_three.description_two:
• Implemented features:
  • Secure login system with JWT and unique access codes for private galleries
  • Custom album module for photo selection, order, and downloads
  • Intuitive user interface for both clients and administrators
